issue.title: [Ruby] Add support of URI objects to load Table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14562](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14562). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We can add support for URI for simple HTTP calls
```java

Arrow::Table.load(URI("https://..."))
```
